result.title: Implementation report for measures targeted to mobility demand management and increased awareness for sustainable mobility
result.description: The report will detail results of demo setup, implementation activities, ITS deployment and supporting actions for all the sites as outputs of T6.3. It will capture how each site has engaged key stakeholders, set up commercial agreements and marketing strategies, derive common success factors and challenges faced, allowing for transfer and adaptation of approaches ahead of measure demonstrations.

result.title: Final Report
result.description: Final report on the achievements of the project. It will report on the organization of activities and the efficiency of the recruitment strategy of the first year of the project. It will emphasize on the project impact results, based on the results of the workshops (WP4), the community built around the project (WP5), and communication and dissemination activities (WP6), as well as on the plans for sustaining the project results in the future, and their contributions to increase MERLIN impact. The delivery of this report is also milestone MS6.

result.title: Performance requirement statement for optimised running gear using novel materials
result.description: This concise report will summarise the specific performance requirements for a railway vehicle with optimised running gear based on novel materials. It will include sections on Body Structure, Running Gear and Wheelsets. It will be available for use in the Run2Rail project and for external researchers and vehicle designers.

result.title: Complete virtual test method for structure-borne and airborne noise transmission
result.description: This deliverable will describe the complete virtual test method, including the various sub-models and the way they are assembled. Methods for determining wheelset vibration, structure-borne noise transmission and airborne noise transmission will be described, including example results for the chosen case study.
